Title: Muscles Mirsky
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Matt Tarses, Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: While Adam (Sean Giambrone) worries about sexual tension between him and his longtime friend Emmy (guest star Stephanie Katherine Grant), Erica (Hayley Orrantia) and Beverly (Wendi McLendon-Covey) square off over a lack of trust.
